TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Marshal extends System.Object
public ref class Marshal abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供了一个方法集合，这些方法用于分配非托管内存、复制非托管内存块、将托管类型转换为非托管类型，此外还提供了在与非托管代码交互时使用的其他杂项方法。

span.span: Provides a collection of methods for allocating unmanaged memory, copying unmanaged memory blocks, and converting managed to unmanaged types, as well as other miscellaneous methods used when interacting with unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对 类定义的 `static` 方法对于使用非托管代码很重要。The `static` methods defined on the class are essential to working with unmanaged code. 此类中定义的大多数方法通常由想要在托管和非托管编程模型之间提供桥梁的开发人员使用。Most methods defined in this class are typically used by developers who want to provide a bridge between the managed and unmanaged programming models. 例如， 方法将 ANSI 字符从指定的字符串（在托管堆中）复制到非托管堆中的缓冲区。For example, the method copies ANSI characters from a specified string (in the managed heap) to a buffer in the unmanaged heap. 它还分配适当大小的目标堆。It also allocates the target heap of the right size. 公共语言运行时提供特定封送处理功能。The common language runtime provides specific marshaling capabilities. 有关封送处理行为的详细信息，请参阅[互操作封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md)。For details on marshaling behavior, see [Interop Marshaling](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md). 类中的 `Read` 和 `Write` 方法支持对齐和未对齐的访问。The `Read` and `Write` methods in the class support both aligned and unaligned access. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类定义的各种方法。The following example shows how to use various methods defined by the class. [!code-cpp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时管理 COM 对象的引用计数，因此无需直接使用此方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 在极少数情况下（例如测试自定义封送拆收器），您可能会发现需要手动操作对象的生存期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 调用 之后，必须使用 等方法来递减引用计数。After calling , you must decrement the reference count by using a method such as . 不要依赖于 的返回值，因为它有时可能不稳定。Do not rely on the return value of , as it can sometimes be unstable. 可以调用 、或 ，以获取表示[IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown)接口指针的 值。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents an [IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown) interface pointer. 你还可以在托管对象上使用这些方法和 方法，以获取托管对象的 COM 可调用包装器所表示的 COM 接口。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to obtain the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's COM callable wrapper. 如果你不熟悉此包装类型的详细信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)器。If you are not familiar with the details of this wrapper type, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 类中两个内存分配 API 方法之一。 is one of two memory allocation API methods in the class. （ 是另一个。）返回的初始内存内容是未定义的，分配的内存可能大于请求的字节数。( is the other.) The initial memory content returned is undefined, and the allocated memory can be larger than the requested number of bytes. 此方法公开 COM [CoTaskMemAlloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148626)函数，该函数称为 com 任务内存分配器。This method exposes the COM [CoTaskMemAlloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148626) function, which is referred to as the COM task memory allocator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 类中两个内存分配方法之一。 is one of two memory allocation methods in the class. （ 是另一个。）此方法从 Kernel32.dll 公开 Win32 [LocalAlloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628)函数。( is the other.) This method exposes the Win32 [LocalAlloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628) function from Kernel32.dll. 当 调用 `LocalAlloc`时，它将传递一个 `LMEM_FIXED` 标志，这会导致已分配的内存就地锁定。When calls `LocalAlloc`, it passes a `LMEM_FIXED` flag, which causes the allocated memory to be locked in place. 而且，分配的内存不会填充零。Also, the allocated memory is not zero-filled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 指示是否可以清除任何上下文中的运行时可调用包装器 (RCW)。

span.span: Indicates whether runtime callable wrappers (RCWs) from any context are available for cleanup.

returns.span: 如果存在任何可清除的 RCW，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there are any RCWs available for cleanup; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果托管代码和本机代码之间存在很多引用和深度依赖关系图，则清理所有对象可能需要较长时间。If there are a lot of references between managed and native code with deep dependency graphs it can take a long time for all the objects to clean up. 每次 GC 运行时，将释放一些 Rcw，这会依次释放基础 COM 对象。Each time a GC runs it will free up some number of RCWs, which will in turn release the underlying COM objects. 然后，这些 COM 对象将释放其托管引用，并在下次运行 GC 时使更多对象可用于清理，这将重新启动该过程。Those COM objects will then release their managed references and make more objects available for cleanup the next time a GC runs, which starts the process over again. 方法为应用程序提供了一种方法来确定 GC 循环的次数。收集和 GC。需要进行 WaitForPendingFinalizers 清理。The method provides a way for the application to determine how many cycles of GC.Collect and GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers need to happen in order to clean everything up.

summary.span: 通知运行时清理当前上下文中分配的所有运行时可调用包装器 (RCW)。

span.span: Notifies the runtime to clean up all Runtime Callable Wrappers (RCWs) allocated in the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 互操作系统会在尝试清理 Rcw 时抽取消息。The interop system pumps messages while it attempts to clean up RCWs. 这可确保在所有应用程序中都发生了单线程单元（STA）的清理，包括不经常进行抽取的应用程序。This ensures that cleanup for single-threaded apartment (STA) RCWs happens in all applications, including applications that do not pump often enough. 但是，某些进行了泵处理的应用程序对于发生泵处理的情况非常敏感。However, some applications that do pump appropriately are very sensitive to where pumping occurs. 当互操作系统在这些应用程序中抽取消息时，在意外的位置，应用程序可能会遇到难以诊断的重入问题。When the interop system pumps messages in these applications, in places that are unexpected, , the application can encounter reentrancy issues that are difficult to diagnose. 因此，应用程序需要能够控制自己的特定 STA 泵并控制 Rcw 的清理。Therefore, applications need to be able to control their own pumping for a particular STA and to control the clean-up of RCWs. 但是，开发人员通常只控制其应用程序中的一小部分线程，因此不能确保所有线程都在适当的情况下进行泵。However, developers often only control a subset of the threads in their application and thus cannot ensure that all threads are pumping appropriately. 若要解决此问题：To solve this problem: 1. 使用 方法可在每个线程的基础上关闭对 Rcw 的自动清理以及发生的消息泵。Use the method to turn off automatic cleanup of RCWs, and the message pumping that occurs, on a per-thread basis. 这使开发人员可以选择退出自动清理，并选择相应的消息泵。This allows developers to opt out of automatic clean-up, and the corresponding message pumping. 2. 使用 方法通知运行时清理当前上下文中分配的所有 Rcw。Use the method to notify the runtime to clean up all RCWs that are allocated in the current context. 此伴生方法使开发人员能够精确控制运行时在当前上下文中执行清理的时间。This companion method allows developers to precisely control when the runtime performs cleanup in the current context.

summary.span: 将数据从非托管内存指针复制到托管 8 位无符号整数数组。

span.span: Copies data from an unmanaged memory pointer to a managed 8-bit unsigned integer array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非托管、C 样式的数组不包含界限信息，这会阻止验证 `startIndex` 和 `length` 参数。Unmanaged, C-style arrays do not contain bounds information, which prevents the `startIndex` and `length` parameters from being validated. 因此，与 `source` 参数对应的非托管数据将填充托管数组，而不考虑其有用性。Thus, the unmanaged data corresponding to the `source` parameter populates the managed array regardless of its usefulness. 在调用此方法之前，必须先用适当的大小初始化托管数组。You must initialize the managed array with the appropriate size before calling this method. ## Examples 下面的示例将一个数组复制到非托管内存，然后将非托管数组复制回托管内存。The following example copies an array to unmanaged memory and then copies the unmanaged array back to managed memory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 非托管、C 样式的数组不包含界限信息，这会阻止验证 `startIndex` 和 `length` 参数。Unmanaged, C-style arrays do not contain bounds information, which prevents the `startIndex` and `length` parameters from being validated. 因此，与 `source` 参数对应的非托管数据将填充托管数组，而不考虑其有用性。Therefore, the unmanaged data that corresponds to the `source` parameter populates the managed array regardless of its usefulness. 在调用 方法之前，必须先用适当的大小初始化托管数组。You must initialize the managed array with the appropriate size before calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将一个 COM 类类型（通常为基 `__ComObject` 类型）转换为另一个 COM 类类型。 converts one COM class type, typically the base `__ComObject` type, to another COM class type. 由参数 `o`表示的输入 COM 对象是一个[运行时可调用包装器（RCW）](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)。The input COM object, represented by parameter `o`, is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper (RCW)](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md). `t` 和 `o` 参数都必须是其签名与 属性特性相同的类。Both the `t` and `o` parameters must be classes whose signatures are attributed with . 当导入类型库时， [tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具会为您应用此特性。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 如果在源代码中手动创建 RCW，则应将此特性应用于表示原始 coclass 的托管签名，以表示其 COM 来源。If you create the RCW manually in source code, you should apply this attribute to the managed signature that represents the original coclass to signify its COM origins. Tlbimp.exe 导入 COM[组件类](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/automat/coclass)作为托管类和接口。Tlbimp.exe imports a COM [coclass](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/automat/coclass) as a managed class and an interface. Coclass 接口具有与原始 coclass 相同的名称，并且托管类的原始 coclass 名称后面追加了 "Class"。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". 例如，名为的 coclass `MyCoclass` 成为称为 `MyCoclass` 的组件类接口和名为 `MyCoclassClass`的托管类。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 由于 `t` 必须是类，而不是接口，因此请确保指定托管类（`MyCoclassClass`）而不是 coclass 接口。Since `t` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the coclass interface. > [!NOTE] > 您将丢失输入 COM 对象的标识，因为新的 RCW 实例包装了由原始 RCW 公开的[IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown)指针。You lose the identity of the input COM object because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `T` 类型的 COM 对象转换为 `TWrapper` COM 类类型。 converts a COM object of type `T` to the `TWrapper` COM class type. 由参数 `o`表示的输入 COM 对象是一个[运行时可调用包装器（RCW）](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)。The input COM object, represented by parameter `o`, is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper (RCW)](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md). `T` 泛型类型参数和 `o` 参数都必须为其签名与 属性特性相同的类。Both the `T` generic type parameter and the `o` parameter must be classes whose signatures are attributed with the attribute. 当导入类型库时， [tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具会为您应用此特性。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 如果在源代码中手动创建 RCW，则应将此特性应用于表示原始 coclass 的托管签名，以表示其 COM 来源。If you create the RCW manually in source code, you should apply this attribute to the managed signature that represents the original coclass to signify its COM origins. Tlbimp.exe 导入 COM[组件类](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/automat/coclass)作为托管类和接口。Tlbimp.exe imports a COM [coclass](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/automat/coclass) as a managed class and an interface. Coclass 接口具有与原始 coclass 相同的名称，并且托管类的原始 coclass 名称后面追加了 "Class"。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". 例如，名为的 coclass `MyCoclass` 成为称为 `MyCoclass` 的组件类接口和名为 `MyCoclassClass`的托管类。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 由于`T` 必须是类，而不是接口，因此请确保指定托管类（`MyCoclassClass`）而不是 `coclass` 接口。Because`T` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the `coclass` interface. > [!NOTE] > 你丢失了输入 COM 对象的标识，因为新的 RCW 实例包装了由原始 RCW 公开的[IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown)指针。You lose the identity of the input COM object, because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来释放非托管结构的引用类型字段，如字符串。You can use this method to free reference-type fields, such as strings, of an unmanaged structure. 与字段不同，结构可以是值类型或引用类型。Unlike its fields, a structure can be a value type or a reference type. 值类型的结构，其中包含值类型字段（所有这些都是可直接复制的）都没有必须释放其内存的引用。Value-type structures that contain value-type fields (all blittable) have no references whose memory must be freed. 方法使用此方法来防止重用结构占用的内存时的内存泄漏。The method uses this method to prevent memory leaks when reusing memory occupied by a structure. 调用 COM [SysFreeString](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633)函数，该函数反过来会释放已分配的字符串。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633) function, which, in turn, frees an allocated string. 除了 之外， 类还提供两个其他的内存释放方法： 和 。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation methods: and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法释放对 COM 对象的托管引用。The method releases the managed reference to a COM object. 调用此方法等效于在循环中调用 方法，直到该方法返回0（零）。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the method in a loop until it returns 0 (zero). 当 COM 对象的引用计数变为0时，通常会释放 COM 对象，尽管这依赖于 COM 对象的实现，但超出了运行时的控制范围。When the reference count on the COM object becomes 0, the COM object is usually freed, although this depends on the COM object's implementation and is beyond the control of the runtime. 但是，RCW 仍可存在，并等待垃圾回收。However, the RCW can still exist, waiting to be garbage-collected. 在将 COM 对象与其基础 RCW 分离后，不能使用它。The COM object cannot be used after it has been separated from its underlying RCW. 如果尝试在 RCW 的引用计数变为0后调用该方法，将会引发 。If you try to call a method on the RCW after its reference count becomes 0, a will be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 和 一样，你可以使用此方法来释放内存。Like and , you can use this method to deallocate memory. 调用 COM [SysFreeString](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633)函数，该函数释放由以下任何非托管方法分配的内存： `SysAllocString`、`SysAllocStringByteLen`、`SysAllocStringLen`、`SysReAllocString`、`SysReAllocStringLen`。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633) function, which frees memory allocated by any of the following unmanaged methods: `SysAllocString`, `SysAllocStringByteLen`, `SysAllocStringLen`, `SysReAllocString`, `SysReAllocStringLen`. 您可以通过平台调用调用非托管方法，例如它们。You can call unmanaged methods such as these with platform invoke. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For details, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 释放由 、或任何等效的非托管方法分配的任何内存。You can use to free any memory allocated by , , or any equivalent unmanaged method. 如果 `ptr` 参数 `null`，则此方法不执行任何操作。If the `ptr` parameter is `null`, the method does nothing. 公开 COM [CoTaskMemFree](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148638)函数，该函数将释放所有字节，使你无法再使用 `ptr` 参数指向的内存。 exposes the COM [CoTaskMemFree](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148638) function, which frees all bytes so that you can no longer use the memory that the `ptr` parameter points to. 除了 之外， 类还提供两个其他的内存释放方法： 和 。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation methods: and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 从 、或任何等效的非托管 API 方法分配的全局堆中释放任何内存。You can use to free any memory from the global heap allocated by , , or any equivalent unmanaged API method. 如果 `hglobal` 参数 则此方法不执行任何操作。If the `hglobal` parameter is the method does nothing. 公开 Kernel32.dll 中的[LocalFree](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148640)函数，该函数可释放所有字节，因此你不能再使用 `hglobal`指向的内存。 exposes the [LocalFree](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148640) function from Kernel32.DLL, which frees all bytes so that you can no longer use the memory pointed to by `hglobal`. 除了 之外， 类还提供两个其他的内存释放 API 方法： 和 。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation API methods: and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#4)] 下面的示例演示如何将托管 类的内容转换为非托管内存，并在完成后释放非托管内存。The following example demonstrates how to convert the contents of a managed class to unmanaged memory and then dispose of the unmanaged memory when done. remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开 OLEAUT32.DLL 中的 COM [GetActiveObject](/windows/win32/api/oleauto/nf-oleauto-getactiveobject)函数。 .DLL但是, 后者需要类标识符 (CLSID), 而不是此方法所需`ProgID`的编程标识符 ()。 exposes the COM [GetActiveObject](/windows/win32/api/oleauto/nf-oleauto-getactiveobject) function from OLEAUT32.DLL; however, the latter expects a class identifier (CLSID) instead of the programmatic identifier (`ProgID`) expected by this method. 若要获取未注册 `ProgID`的 COM 对象的运行实例，请使用平台调用来定义 COM [GetActiveObject](/windows/win32/api/oleauto/nf-oleauto-getactiveobject)函数。To obtain a running instance of a COM object without a registered `ProgID`, use platform invoke to define the COM [GetActiveObject](/windows/win32/api/oleauto/nf-oleauto-getactiveobject) function. 有关平台调用的说明，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For a description of platform invoke, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## ProgID 和 CLSIDProgID and CLSID 注册表的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT 子树中的键包含多种子项类型。Keys in the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT subtree of the registry contain a variety of subkey types. 大多数子项均为 Progid，这会将用户友好的字符串映射到 CLSID。Most of the subkeys are ProgIDs, which map a user-friendly string to a CLSID. 应用程序通常使用这些可读取的字符串而不是数字 Clsid。Applications often use these human-readable strings instead of the numeric CLSIDs. 通常，组件具有独立于版本的 ProgID，该 ProgID 映射到系统上安装的最新版本的组件。Often, a component has a version-independent ProgID that is mapped to the latest version of the component that is installed on the system. 应用程序和组件主要使用 Progid 检索其相应的 Clsid。Applications and components primarily use ProgIDs to retrieve their corresponding CLSIDs. ## Examples 以下示例在配置了运行 Microsoft Word 实例的计算机上运行。The following example was run on a computer that was configured with a running instance of Microsoft Word. Microsoft Excel 没有运行的实例。There were no instances of Microsoft Excel running. 该示例调用两次 。The example calls twice. 第一次调用尝试检索对 Microsoft Word （`Word.Application` 对象的实例）的实例的引用。The first call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word (an instance of the `Word.Application` object). 第二次调用尝试检索对 Microsoft Excel （`Excel.Application` 对象的实例）的实例的引用。The second call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Excel (an instance of an `Excel.Application` object). 此代码成功检索对 Microsoft Word 实例的引用。The code retrieves a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word successfully. 但是，由于 Microsoft Excel 未运行，尝试检索第二个对象会引发 。However, because Microsoft Excel is not running, the attempt to retrieve the second object raises a . [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/cs/marshal.getactiveobject.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/vb/marshal.getactiveobject.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个接口指针，该指针表示指定对象上所请求的接口。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the requested interface on the specified object. 如果你的非托管方法需要传递接口指针，则此方法特别有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 使用此方法调用对象会使引用计数在返回指针之前在接口指针上递增。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 使用指针完成后，始终使用 来递减引用计数。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 使用原始 COM 接口指针时，必须遵守 COM 定义的规则。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 在调用以 类型公开 COM 对象参数或使用自定义封送处理的方法时非常有用。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 虽然不太常见，但你可以对托管对象使用此方法，以获取指向对象的 COM 可调用包装器的指针。Although less common, you can use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper. 例如，可以对导出到 COM 的托管对象使用 ，以获取 的接口指针。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 无法获取指向类接口的指针，因为类接口缺少相应类型要传递给第二个参数（`t`）。You cannot obtain a pointer to a class interface since a class interface lacks the corresponding type to pass to the second parameter (`t`). 请改用 调用 COM 可调用包装（通常为自动调度类接口）的默认接口上的成员。Instead, use to invoke the members on the default interface of the COM callable wrapper, which is usually an auto-dispatch class interface. 默认情况下， 方法重载允许自定义查询接口。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否应用查询接口自定义项，请使用 方法重载。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 有关其他信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)器和[运行时可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)器。For additional information, see the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md) and [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) articles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个接口指针，该指针表示指定对象上的 `TInterface` 接口。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the `TInterface` interface on the specified object. 如果你的非托管方法需要传递接口指针，则此方法特别有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 使用此方法调用对象会使引用计数在返回指针之前在接口指针上递增。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 使用 方法时，请始终使用方法来递减指针。Always use the method to decrement the reference count when you have finished with the pointer. 使用原始 COM 接口指针时，必须遵守 COM 定义的规则。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 在调用以 类型公开 COM 对象参数或使用自定义封送处理的方法时非常有用。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 你还可以对托管对象使用此方法，以获取指向对象的 COM 可调用包装的指针，但这种情况不太常见。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper, although this is less common. 例如，可以对导出到 COM 的托管对象使用 ，以获取 的接口指针。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 默认情况下， 方法重载允许自定义查询接口。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否应用查询接口自定义项，请使用 方法重载。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 有关其他信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)器和[运行时可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)器。For additional information, see the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md) and [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) articles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的从零开始的插槽号，适用于三个[IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown)和四个[IDispatch](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-idispatch)方法，使第一个可用槽的值为3或7。The zero-based slot number returned by this method accounts for three [IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown) and possibly four [IDispatch](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-idispatch) methods, making the value of the first available slot either 3 or 7. 提供 的相反功能。 provides the opposite functionality of . 您可以使用此方法来检索接口的成员的槽编号，这些接口在 COM 和专用接口的成员中不可见。You can use this method to retrieve slot numbers for members of interfaces that are not visible from COM and for members of private interfaces. 返回的槽编号对应于在向 COM 公开类型时将保留的 v 表号。The slot numbers returned correspond to the v-table numbers that would be reserved if the type was exposed to COM. COM 不可见成员实际上在公开的 v 表中占据了槽，即使 COM 客户端无法使用该槽。COM-invisible members actually occupy a slot in an exposed v-table, even though the COM client cannot use the slot. 不能通过从类传递 来使用类接口上的 。You cannot use on a class interface by passing from a class. 有关其他信息，请参阅[类接口简介](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md#introducing-the-class-interface)。For additional information, see [Introducing the class interface](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md#introducing-the-class-interface).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 .NET Framework 的版本1.0 和1.1 中，可以将表示托管方法的委托作为函数指针传递到非托管代码，从而允许非托管代码通过函数指针调用托管方法。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, it was possible to pass a delegate representing a managed method to unmanaged code as a function pointer, allowing the unmanaged code to call the managed method through the function pointer. 此外，非托管代码还可能将该函数指针传递回托管代码，并将该指针正确解析为底层托管方法。It was also possible for the unmanaged code to pass that function pointer back to the managed code, and the pointer was resolved properly to the underlying managed method. 在 .NET Framework 2.0 及更高版本中，可以使用 和 方法来封送双向委托。In the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, you can use the and methods to marshal delegates in both directions. 使用 时，`ptr` 将作为 导入。With , `ptr` is imported as a . 可以通过调用 并作为参数传递来获取托管委托的 ;然后，可以从非托管方法中调用它。A can be obtained for a managed delegate by calling and passed as a parameter; it can then be called from inside the unmanaged method. 请注意，参数封送拆收器还可以将函数指针封送到 .NET Framework 2.0 及更高版本中的委托。Note that the parameter marshaler can also marshal function pointers to delegates in the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions. 方法有以下限制：The method has the following restrictions: - 互操作方案中不支持泛型。Generics are not supported in interop scenarios. - 不能将无效的函数指针传递到此方法。You cannot pass an invalid function pointer to this method. - 此方法只能用于纯非托管函数指针。You can use this method only for pure unmanaged function pointers. - 不能将此方法用于通过C++或从 方法获取的函数指针。You cannot use this method with function pointers obtained through C++ or from the method. - 不能使用此方法创建一个从函数指针到另一个托管委托的委托。You cannot use this method to create a delegate from a function pointer to another managed delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回接口或类的从零开始的 v 表号。This method returns the zero-based, v-table number for an interface or a class. 在类上使用时，返回的槽号码引用类的类接口。When used on a class, the slot number returned refers to the class interface for the class. 如果类接口是自动调度的，则此方法始终返回-1，以指示仅调度接口不向托管客户端公开 "v-表"。If the class interface is auto-dispatch, this method always returns -1 to indicate that the dispatch-only interface does not expose a v-table to managed clients. 可以将 和 与 结合使用来传递指定范围内的槽。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. 有关其他信息，请参阅[类接口简介](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md#introducing-the-class-interface)。For additional information, see [Introducing the class interface](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md#introducing-the-class-interface).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还为异常设置[IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo)接口，该接口可通过调用 COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID 函数获得。 also sets up an [IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo) interface for the exception that can be obtained by calling the COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID function. 您可以使用此函数在应用 特性的 COM 接口的托管类实现上返回 HRESULT 值。You can use this function to return an HRESULT value on a managed class implementation of a COM interface where you apply the attribute. 使特性化方法捕获所有异常并使用 方法返回相应的 HRESULT 值。Have the attributed method catch all exceptions and use the method to return the appropriate HRESULT value. 允许异常在方法外传播会产生不正确的行为。Allowing an exception to propagate outside the method produces incorrect behavior. （实际上，公共语言运行时无法将异常传递给通过 v 表调用此类方法的 COM 客户端。）(In fact, the common language runtime fails to pass an exception to a COM client that calls such a method through a v-table.) 请注意， 方法将设置当前线程的[IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo)接口。Note that the method sets the [IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo) interface of the current thread. 这可能会导致 方法（例如，如果已设置，则默认为使用当前线程的[IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo) ）中出现意外的结果。This can cause unexpected results for methods like the methods that default to using the [IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo) of the current thread if it is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在托管代码中，很少直接使用 `IDispatch` 接口。In managed code, you seldom work directly with the `IDispatch` interface. 但是，当调用将 COM 对象参数作为 类型公开的方法或使用自定义封送处理时， 非常有用。However, is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 使用此方法调用对象会使引用计数在返回指针之前在接口指针上递增。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 使用指针完成后，始终使用 来递减引用计数。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 你还可以对托管对象使用此方法，以获取指向对象的 COM 可调用包装器的接口指针。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain an interface pointer to the COM callable wrapper for the object. 有关其他信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)器。For additional information, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

summary.span: 返回由上一个非托管函数返回的错误代码，该函数是使用设置了 标志的平台调用来的。

span.span: Returns the error code returned by the last unmanaged function that was called using platform invoke that has the flag set.

returns.span: 通过调用 Win32 SetLastError 函数设置的最后一个错误代码。

span.span: The last error code set by a call to the Win32 SetLastError function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 系统中， 从 Kernel32.dll 公开 Win32 [GetLastError](/windows/desktop/ms679360)函数。On Windows systems, exposes the Win32 [GetLastError](/windows/desktop/ms679360) function from Kernel32.DLL. 此方法存在的原因是，对 `GetLastError` 进行直接平台调用以获取此信息是不可靠的。This method exists because it is not reliable to make a direct platform invoke call to `GetLastError` to obtain this information. 如果要访问此错误代码，则必须调用 ，而不是编写自己的 `GetLastError` 的平台调用定义并调用它。If you want to access this error code, you must call instead of writing your own platform invoke definition for `GetLastError` and calling it. 公共语言运行时可以对覆盖操作系统维护的 `GetLastError` 的 Api 进行内部调用。The common language runtime can make internal calls to APIs that overwrite the `GetLastError` maintained by the operating system. 仅当将 应用到方法签名并将 字段设置为 `true`时，才能使用此方法获取错误代码。You can use this method to obtain error codes only if you apply the to the method signature and set the field to `true`. 此过程的过程因所使用的源语言而异C# ： C++默认情况下 `false`，但 Visual Basic 中的 `Declare` 语句是 `true`的。The process for this varies depending upon the source language used: C# and C++ are `false` by default, but the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic is `true`. .NET Core 上的 `GetLastWin32Error` 方法的行为有所不同，并且在 `true` 时 .NET Framework。There is a difference in the behavior of the `GetLastWin32Error` method on .NET Core and .NET Framework when is `true`. 在 .NET Framework 上，`GetLastWin32Error` 方法可将错误信息从一个 P/Invoke 调用保留到下一个。On .NET Framework, the `GetLastWin32Error` method can retain error information from one P/Invoke call to the next. 在 .NET Core 上，在 P/Invoke 调用之前会清除错误信息，而 `GetLastWin32Error` 仅表示来自最后一个方法调用的错误信息。On .NET Core, error information is cleared before P/Invoke call, and the `GetLastWin32Error` represents only error information from the last method call. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 `GetLastWin32Error` 方法。The following example calls the `GetLastWin32Error` method. 该示例首先演示如何调用方法，但不会出现错误，然后说明调用方法时出现错误。The example first demonstrates calling the method with no error present and then demonstrates calling the method with an error present. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值可以是 、或 对象。The return value may be a , , or object. 返回值取决于给定 COM 槽中存在的托管成员的类型（因此通用化返回类型 三个派生的）。The return value depends on the type of managed member that exists in the given COM slot (hence the generalized return type from which all three derive). 此方法返回的从零开始的插槽号，适用于三个[IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown)和四个[IDispatch](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-idispatch)方法，使第一个可用槽的值为3或7。The zero-based slot number that is returned by this method accounts for three [IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown) and possibly four [IDispatch](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-idispatch) methods, making the value of the first available slot either 3 or 7. 提供 的相反功能。 provides the opposite functionality of . 可以将 和 与 结合使用来传递指定范围内的槽。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. `memberType` 参数仅在返回时才重要。The `memberType` parameter is important only on return. 它包含对应于返回 对象的 COM 成员的类型（常规方法或属性访问器）。It contains the type of the COM member (a regular method or a property accessor) that corresponds to the returned object.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetObjectForIUnknown (IntPtr pUnk);
.method public static hidebysig object GetObjectForIUnknown(native int pUnk) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetObjectForIUnknown (pUnk As IntPtr) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetObjectForIUnknown(IntPtr pUnk);
static member GetObjectForIUnknown : nativeint -> obj

param.name: pUnk
param.span: 指向 接口的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the interface.

summary.span: 返回一个类型实例，该实例通过指向 COM 对象的 IUnknown 接口的指针表示该对象。

span.span: Returns an instance of a type that represents a COM object by a pointer to its IUnknown interface.

returns.span: 一个对象，表示指定的非托管 COM 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the specified unmanaged COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法包装托管对象中的 `IUnknown`。This method wraps `IUnknown` in a managed object. 这会增加 COM 组件的引用计数。This has the effect of incrementing the reference count of the COM component. 当运行时对表示 COM 对象的托管对象执行垃圾回收时，引用计数将减少。The reference count will be decremented when the runtime performs garbage collection on the managed object that represents the COM object. `pUnk` 参数表示 `IUnknown` 的接口指针;但是，因为所有 COM 接口都是直接或间接从 `IUnknown`派生的，所以你可以将任何 COM 接口传递到此方法。The `pUnk` parameter represents an `IUnknown` interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 返回的对象是一个[运行时可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)器，公共语言运行时将像管理任何其他托管对象一样管理。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object. 此包装的类型通常为基 `System.__ComObject` 类型，这是包装类型不明确时使用的隐藏类型。The type of this wrapper is often a base `System.__ComObject` type, which is a hidden type used when the wrapper type is ambiguous. 只要 COM 对象实现[IDispatch](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-idispatch(vs.85))接口，仍可对此类基类型进行后期绑定调用。You can still make late-bound calls to such a base type as long as the COM object implements the [IDispatch](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-idispatch(vs.85)) interface. 同样，您可以将返回的对象强制转换为适当的 COM 接口。Likewise, you can cast the returned object to an appropriate COM interface. 对于要使用特定托管类类型（而不是泛型包装类型）进行包装的对象，您必须遵守以下要求：For an object to be wrapped with a specific managed class type (and not a generic wrapper type), you must adhere to the following requirements: - 实现 COM 对象的[IProvideClassInfo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012)接口。Implement the [IProvideClassInfo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012) interface for the COM object. - 用 appcmd.exe [（程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)注册包含程序集。Register the containing assembly with the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md). 另外，还可以通过使用 方法，避免这些要求，并获得一个使用特定托管类类型进行包装的对象。Alternatively, you can avoid these requirements and still get an object that is wrapped with a specific managed class type by using the method.

returns.span: 如果接口基于 IUnknown，则第一个槽为 3；如果接口基于 [IDispatch](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-idispatch)，则为 7。

span.span: The first slot is 3 if the interface is based on IUnknown, and 7 if the interface is based on [IDispatch](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-idispatch).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回接口或类的从零开始的 v 表号。This method returns the zero-based v-table number for an interface or a class. 在类上使用时，返回的槽号将引用类的类接口。When used on a class, the slot number that is returned refers to the class interface for the class. 如果类接口是自动调度的，则此方法始终返回-1，以指示仅调度接口不向托管客户端公开 "v-表"。If the class interface is auto-dispatch, this method always returns -1 to indicate that the dispatch-only interface does not expose a v-table to managed clients. 可以将 和 与 结合使用来传递指定范围内的槽。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. 有关其他信息，请参阅[类接口简介](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md#introducing-the-class-interface)。For additional information, see [Introducing the class interface](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md#introducing-the-class-interface).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `t` 参数必须是 COM 导入的类型或 COM 导入的类型的子类型。The `t` parameter must be either a COM-imported type or a subtype of a COM-imported type. 此外，`t` 必须是由[tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具导入元数据的类型。In addition, `t` must be a type whose metadata was imported by the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool. 此类型必须是类，而不是关联的 coclass 接口，该接口携带 COM 类的名称。This type must be a class and not an associated coclass interface, which carries the name of the COM class. 例如，如果 Tlbimp.exe 作为名为 `MyclassClass` 的类和称为 `Myclass`的 coclass 接口导入 `Myclass`，则必须将 `MyclassClass` （而不是 `Myclass`）用于此方法。For example, if Tlbimp.exe imports `Myclass` as a class called `MyclassClass` and as a coclass interface called `Myclass`, you must use `MyclassClass` (not `Myclass`) with this method. 有关导入的类和 coclass 接口的其他信息，请参阅[导入的类型转换](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/s8sdycxx(v=vs.100))。For additional information about imported classes and coclass interfaces, see [Imported Type Conversion](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/s8sdycxx(v=vs.100)). 如果已为 `pUnk` 参数获取了对象，则将忽略 `t` 并返回现有对象。If an object has already been obtained for the `pUnk` parameter, `t` is ignored and the existing object is returned. `pUnk` 表示[IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown)接口指针;但是，因为所有 COM 接口都是直接或间接从 `IUnknown`派生的，所以你可以将任何 COM 接口传递到此方法。`pUnk` represents an [IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown) interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 返回的对象是一个[运行时可调用包装器（RCW）](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，公共语言运行时将其作为其他任何托管对象进行管理。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper (RCW)](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object.

[Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具使用自定义封送拆收器将 `ITypeInfo` 参数转换为 参数。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool uses the custom marshaler to translate `ITypeInfo` parameters to parameters. 但是，如果通过其他方式（Tlbimp.exe 除外）获取 `ITypeInfo` 接口，则可以使用 手动执行相同的转换。However, if you obtain an `ITypeInfo` interface by some means other than Tlbimp.exe, you can use to manually perform the same translation.

[Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具基于程序集的标识计算 LIBID 值。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool calculates a LIBID value based on the identity of the assembly. 如果应用了属性， 将返回与 关联的 LIBID。 returns the LIBID that is associated with the , if the attribute is applied. 否则， 返回计算的值。Otherwise, returns the calculated value. 或者，您可以使用 方法从现有类型库中提取实际的 LIBID。Alternatively, you can use the method to extract the actual LIBID from an existing type library. 有关库标识符的详细信息，请参阅[导出的程序集转换](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/t1ztw645(v=vs.100))主题。See the [Exported Assembly Conversion](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/t1ztw645(v=vs.100)) topic for more information about library identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果实例的类类型是使用 特性化的，或者如果它是直接或间接派生自使用 特性化的类， 将返回 `true`。 returns `true` if the class type of the instance is attributed with or if it derives directly or indirectly from a class attributed with . 当导入类型库时， [tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具会为您应用此特性。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 另外两个方法还确定指定的对象是否表示 COM 对象，但返回 `true` 的要求不同于此方法的要求。Two other methods also determine whether a specified object represents a COM object, but the requirements for returning `true` differ from this method's requirements. 如果类（或接口） 直接特性化，则 返回 `true`;它不返回派生类型的 `true`。 returns `true` if the class (or interface) is attributed with directly; it does not return `true` for derived types. 如果类型具有 特性或派生自具有相同 GUID 的类型，则 返回 `true`。 returns `true` if the type is attributed with or derives from a type with the same GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回在非托管内存中表示方法签名的参数所需的堆栈大小（以字节为单位）。The method returns the stack size (in bytes) needed to represent the parameters of a method signature in unmanaged memory. 请注意，此方法的返回值与平台相关。Note that the return value of this method is platform-dependent. 例如，带单个 integer 参数的签名将在32位平台上返回值4，在64位平台上返回值8。For example, a signature with a single integer parameter returns a value of 4 on 32-bit platforms and a value of 8 on 64-bit platforms.

summary.span: 在不调用方法的情况下执行一次性方法设置任务。

span.span: Executes one-time method setup tasks without calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置任务提供早期初始化，并在调用目标方法时自动执行。Setup tasks provide early initialization and are performed automatically when the target method is invoked. 第一次任务包括以下各项：First-time tasks include the following: - 验证平台调用元数据的格式是否正确。Verifying that the platform invoke metadata is correctly formatted. - 验证所有托管类型是否都是平台调用函数的有效参数。Verifying that all the managed types are valid parameters of platform invoke functions. - 将非托管 DLL 定位并加载到进程中。Locating and loading the unmanaged DLL into the process. - 正在查找进程中的入口点。Locating the entry point in the process. 对平台调用之外的方法调用 不起作用。Calling on a method outside of platform invoke has no effect. 若要对某一类型中的所有平台调用方法执行安装任务，请使用 。To execute setup tasks on all platform invoke methods in a type, use .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法公开 COM 对象的[IUnknown：： QueryInterface](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867)方法，该方法尝试获取特定接口指针。The method exposes the [IUnknown::QueryInterface](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method of a COM object, which attempts to obtain a specific interface pointer. 对 COM 对象使用 `QueryInterface` 与在托管代码中执行强制转换运算相同。Using `QueryInterface` on a COM object is the same as performing a cast operation in managed code. 使用此方法调用对象会使引用计数在返回指针之前在接口指针上递增。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 使用指针完成后，始终使用 来递减引用计数。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 若要获取表示[IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown)接口指针的 值，可以调用 、或 。To obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown) interface pointer, you can call , , or .

[!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/vb/example.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法读取非托管字符的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to read the value of an unmanaged character. remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时管理 COM 对象的引用计数，因此无需直接使用此方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 仅将此值用于测试目的。Use this value only for testing purposes. 在极少数情况下（例如测试自定义封送拆收器），您可能会发现需要手动操作对象的生存期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 只有调用 的程序才能调用 。Only programs that call should call . 当引用计数达到零时调用 将导致未定义的行为。Calling after the reference count has reached zero causes undefined behavior. 可以调用 、或 ，以获取表示要释放的[IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown)接口指针的 值。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](/windows/win32/api/unknwn/nn-unknwn-iunknown) interface pointer to release. 你还可以对托管对象使用这些方法和 方法，以释放托管对象的[com 可调用包装](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)器所表示的 com 接口。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to release the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法检索托管对象的 `IUnknown` 接口。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an `IUnknown` interface for a managed object using the method. 然后，该示例通过调用 方法释放接口指针。The example then releases the interface pointer by calling the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/vb/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 递减与指定的 COM 对象关联的运行时可调用包装器 (RCW) 的引用计数。

span.span: Decrements the reference count of the Runtime Callable Wrapper (RCW) associated with the specified COM object.

returns.span: 与 关联的 RCW 的新引用计数值。

span.span: The new value of the reference count of the RCW associated with .

returns.span: 此值通常为零，因为无论调用包装 COM 对象的托管客户端有多少，RCW 仅保留对该对象的一次引用。

span.span: This value is typically zero since the RCW keeps just one reference to the wrapped COM object regardless of the number of managed clients calling it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于显式控制从托管代码使用的 COM 对象的生存期。This method is used to explicitly control the lifetime of a COM object used from managed code. 你应使用此方法免费释放包含对资源的引用的基础 COM 对象，或在对象必须按特定顺序释放时使用此方法。You should use this method to free the underlying COM object that holds references to resources in a timely manner or when objects must be freed in a specific order. 每当 COM 接口指针进入公共语言运行时（CLR）时，就会将其包装在 RCW 中。Every time a COM interface pointer enters the common language runtime (CLR), it is wrapped in an RCW. RCW 有一个引用计数，每次将 COM 接口指针映射到该引用计数时，它都会递增。The RCW has a reference count that is incremented every time a COM interface pointer is mapped to it. 方法递减 RCW 的引用计数。The method decrements the reference count of an RCW. 当引用计数达到零时，运行时将释放其对非托管 COM 对象的所有引用，如果尝试进一步使用对象，则会引发 。When the reference count reaches zero, the runtime releases all its references on the unmanaged COM object, and throws a if you attempt to use the object further. 如果从非托管代码向托管代码传递了同一 COM 接口，则包装上的引用计数每次都会递增，并且调用 将返回剩余引用的数目。If the same COM interface is passed more than one time from unmanaged to managed code, the reference count on the wrapper is incremented every time, and calling returns the number of remaining references. 此方法使你可以强制 RCW 引用计数版本，使其在你需要时精确地进行。This method enables you to force an RCW reference count release so that it occurs precisely when you want it to. 但是，不正确地使用 可能导致应用程序失败，或者可能导致访问冲突。However, improper use of may cause your application to fail, or may cause an access violation. 假设应用程序域中的托管代码持有的应用程序域中的托管代码包含在表示 COM 组件的 RCW 上。Consider a scenario in which managed code in an application domain is holding onto an RCW that represents a COM component. 如果对 RCW 调用 方法，托管代码将无法访问 RCW，并引发 异常。If you call the method on the RCW, the managed code will be unable to access the RCW and will raise an exception. 如果在释放 RCW 时执行对 RCW 的调用，则可能发生更严重的错误。A more serious error may occur if a call to the RCW is executing when the RCW is released. 在这种情况下，发出调用的线程很有可能会导致访问冲突。In this case, there is a good chance that the thread making the call will cause an access violation. 但是，进程内存可能会损坏，进程可能会继续运行，直到由于很难调试的原因而失败。However, process memory may become corrupted, and the process may continue to run until it fails for reasons that are very difficult to debug. 如果正在使用的 COM 组件是单一实例，则此风险更加复杂，原因如下： CLR 通过调用 COM [CoCreateInstance](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894)函数来激活 com 组件，在每次为单独 COM 组件调用该函数时，它都会返回相同的接口指针。This risk is compounded when the COM component that is being used is a singleton, for the following reason: The CLR activates COM components by calling the COM [CoCreateInstance](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894) function, which returns the same interface pointer every time it is called for singleton COM components. 因此，应用程序域中的单独的和独立的托管代码段可以对单独 COM 组件使用同一个 RCW，如果其中任何一个都调用 COM 组件上的 方法，则另一个将被破坏。Thus, separate and independent pieces of managed code in an application domain can be using the same RCW for a singleton COM component, and if either one calls the method on the COM component, the other will be broken. 因此，仅当绝对需要时才使用 。Therefore, use the only if it is absolutely required. 如果要调用此方法以确保在确定的时间释放 COM 组件，请考虑改用 方法。If you want to call this method to ensure that a COM component is released at a determined time, consider using the method instead. 将释放基础 COM 组件，而不考虑它重新进入 CLR 的次数。 will release the underlying COM component regardless of how many times it has re-entered the CLR. 每当 COM 组件重新进入 CLR 时，RCW 的内部引用计数将递增1。The internal reference count of the RCW is incremented by one every time the COM component re-enters the CLR. 因此，可以在循环中调用 方法，直到返回的值为零。Therefore, you could call the method in a loop until the value returned is zero. 这样就实现了与 方法相同的结果。This achieves the same result as the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对于自定义封送处理或混合托管代码和非托管代码很有用。The method is useful for custom marshaling or when mixing managed and unmanaged code. 由于此方法会分配字符串所需的非托管内存，因此请始终通过调用 来释放内存。Because this method allocates the unmanaged memory required for a string, always free the memory by calling . 将字符串的字符复制为 ANSI 字符。The characters of the string are copied as ANSI characters. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将 对象的内容封送到非托管内存块并对其进行解密。The following example uses the method to marshal and decrypt the contents of a object to a block of unmanaged memory. 然后，它使用 方法为零出并释放非托管块。It then uses the method to zero out and dispose the unmanaged block. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法接受结构的实例，该实例可以是引用类型或装箱值类型。This method accepts an instance of a structure, which can be a reference type or a boxed value type. 布局必须是连续或显式的。The layout must be sequential or explicit. 返回的大小是非托管对象的大小。The size returned is the size of the unmanaged object. 对象的非托管和托管大小可能不同。The unmanaged and managed sizes of an object can differ. 对于字符类型，大小受应用于该类的 值影响。For character types, the size is affected by the value applied to that class. 您可以使用 方法来确定要使用 和 方法分配的非托管内存量。You can use the method to determine how much unmanaged memory to allocate using the and methods. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个托管结构，将其传输到非托管内存，然后将其传输回托管内存。The following example creates a managed structure, transfers it to unmanaged memory, and then transfers it back to managed memory. 此示例使用 方法来确定要分配的非托管内存量。This example uses the method to determine how much unmanaged memory to allocate. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/vb/sample.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("StructureToPtr(Object, IntPtr, Boolean) may be unavailable in future releases. Instead, use StructureToPtr<T>(T, IntPtr, Boolean). For more info, go to http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=296516")

param.name: structure
param.span: 包含要封送的数据的托管对象。

span.span: A managed object that holds the data to be marshaled.

param.span: 该对象必须是格式化类的结构或实例。

span.span: This object must be a structure or an instance of a formatted class.

param.name: ptr
param.span: 指向非托管内存块的指针，必须在调用此方法之前分配该指针。

span.span: A pointer to an unmanaged block of memory, which must be allocated before this method is called.

param.name: fDeleteOld
param.span: 如果在此方法复制该数据前在 参数上调用 ，则为 。

span.span: to call the method on the parameter before this method copies the data.

param.span: 该块必须包含有效的数据。

span.span: The block must contain valid data.

param.span: 请注意，在内存块已包含数据时传递 可能会导致内存泄漏。

span.span: Note that passing when the memory block already contains data can lead to a memory leak.

summary.span: 将数据从托管对象封送到非托管内存块。

span.span: Marshals data from a managed object to an unmanaged block of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `structure` 是值类型，则可以装箱或取消装箱。If `structure` is a value type, it can be boxed or unboxed. 如果已装箱，则会在复制前取消装箱。If it is boxed, it is unboxed before copying. 格式化类是一种引用类型，其布局由 属性指定，如 或 。A formatted class is a reference type whose layout is specified by the attribute, as either or . 将 `structure` 的内容复制到 `ptr` 参数指向的预分配内存块。 copies the contents of `structure` to the pre-allocated block of memory that the `ptr` parameter points to. 如果 `structure` 包含封送到 COM 接口指针的引用类型（接口、无布局的类和 ），则托管对象将与引用计数保持活动状态。If `structure` contains reference types that marshal to COM interface pointers (interfaces, classes without layout, and ), the managed objects are kept alive with reference counts. 所有其他引用类型（如字符串和数组）都将封送到副本。All other reference types (for example, strings and arrays) are marshaled to copies. 若要释放这些托管或非托管对象，必须先调用 方法，然后再释放内存块。To release these managed or unmanaged objects, you must call the method before you free the memory block. 如果使用 方法稍后将不同的实例复制到内存块，请指定 `fDeleteOld` 的 `true`，以便删除上一实例中引用类型的引用计数。If you use the method to copy a different instance to the memory block at a later time, specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` to remove reference counts for reference types in the previous instance. 否则，托管引用类型和非托管副本实际上是泄漏的。Otherwise, the managed reference types and unmanaged copies are effectively leaked. 使用 的整体模式如下所示：The overall pattern for using is as follows: 1. 在分配内存块后第一次调用 方法时，必须 `false``fDeleteOld`，因为没有要清除的内容。On the first call to the method after a memory block has been allocated, `fDeleteOld` must be `false`, because there are no contents to clear. > [!IMPORTANT] > 仅当块包含有效数据时，才为 `fDeleteOld` 指定 `true`。Specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` only if the block contains valid data. 2. 如果将不同的实例复制到内存块，并且该对象包含引用类型，则必须将 `fDeleteOld` `true` 到旧内容中的引用类型。If you copy a different instance to the memory block, and the object contains reference types, `fDeleteOld` must be `true` to free reference types in the old contents. 3. 如果对象包含引用类型，则在释放内存块之前必须调用 方法。If the object contains reference types, you must call the method before you free the memory block. > [!NOTE] > 若要固定现有结构而不是复制它，请使用 类型创建该结构的固定句柄。To pin an existing structure instead of copying it, use the type to create a pinned handle for the structure. 有关如何固定的详细信息，请参阅[复制和锁定](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md)。For details on how to pin, see [Copying and Pinning](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个托管结构，使用 方法将其传输到非托管内存，然后使用 方法将它传输回托管内存。The following example creates a managed structure, transfers it to unmanaged memory using the method, and then transfers it back to managed memory using the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ThrowExceptionForHR (int errorCode);
.method public static hidebysig void ThrowExceptionForHR(int32 errorCode) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ThrowExceptionForHR (errorCode As Integer)
public: static void ThrowExceptionForHR(int errorCode);
static member ThrowExceptionForHR : int -> unit

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 与所需异常相对应的 HRESULT。

span.span: The HRESULT corresponding to the desired exception.

summary.span: 用特定的失败 HRESULT 值引发异常。

span.span: Throws an exception with a specific failure HRESULT value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为指定的失败 HRESULT 创建异常对象。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 为0或正数（成功代码），则方法将返回，而不创建或引发异常。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 请注意， 方法返回一个异常，该异常基于当前线程的[IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo)接口（如果已设置）。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo) interface of the current thread if one is set. 发生这种情况时，将忽略 `errorCode` 参数。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失败 Hresult 映射到定义的异常，而其他失败。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 映射到定义的异常， 将创建异常的实例并引发异常。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否则，它将创建一个 实例，使用 HRESULT 初始化错误代码字段，并引发此异常。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. 调用 时，它会使用非托管[GetErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oleauto/nf-oleauto-geterrorinfo)函数尝试检索有关错误的额外信息。When is invoked, it attempts to retrieve extra information regarding the error by using the unmanaged [GetErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oleauto/nf-oleauto-geterrorinfo) function. 有关从每个 HRESULT 到 .NET Framework 中的可比较异常类的映射，请参阅[如何：映射 hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md). 偶尔， 可能会从以前的 COM 调用返回异常。Occasionally, might return an exception from a previous COM call. 在这种情况下，可以使用以下解决方法并将 `IntPtr(-1)` 作为第二个参数（`errorInfo`）传递：In this case, you can use the following workaround and pass `IntPtr(-1)` as the second parameter (`errorInfo`): ``` [SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.LinkDemand, Flags = SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode)] public static void ThrowExceptionForHR(interrorCode,IntPtrerrorInfo) ```

param.span: 指向 IErrorInfo 接口的指针，该接口提供有关错误的详细信息。

param.span: 可以指定 IntPtr(0) 以使用当前的 IErrorInfo 接口，或者 IntPtr(-1) 以忽略当前的 IErrorInfo 接口，并仅从错误代码构造异常。

span.span: You can specify IntPtr(0) to use the current IErrorInfo interface, or IntPtr(-1) to ignore the current IErrorInfo interface and construct the exception just from the error code.

summary.span: 基于指定的 IErrorInfo 接口，用特定的失败 HRESULT 引发异常。

span.span: Throws an exception with a specific failure HRESULT, based on the specified IErrorInfo interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为指定的失败 HRESULT 创建异常对象。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 为0或正数（成功代码），则方法将返回，而不创建或引发异常。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 方法释放 `errorInfo` 参数，从而降低[IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo)接口的 COM 引用计数。The method releases the `errorInfo` parameter, decreasing the COM reference count of the [IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo) interface. 请注意， 方法返回一个异常，该异常基于当前线程的[IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo)接口（如果已设置）。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nn-oaidl-ierrorinfo) interface of the current thread if one is set. 发生这种情况时，将忽略 `errorCode` 参数。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失败 Hresult 映射到定义的异常，而其他失败。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 映射到定义的异常， 将创建异常的实例并引发异常。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否则，它将创建一个 实例，使用 HRESULT 初始化错误代码字段，并引发此异常。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. `errorInfo` 参数用于检索有关错误的额外信息。The `errorInfo` parameter is used to retrieve extra information regarding the error. 有关从每个 HRESULT 到 .NET Framework 中的可比较异常类的映射，请参阅[如何：映射 hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

span.span: Writes a single byte value to unmanaged memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现与非托管 C 样式字节数组的直接交互，消除将整个非托管数组（使用 ）复制到单独托管数组的开销，然后再设置其元素值。 enables direct interaction with an unmanaged C-style byte array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before setting its element values. ## Examples 下面的示例创建非托管内存块，将字节写入非托管内存，从非托管内存读取字节，然后释放非托管内存。The following example creates a block of unmanaged memory, writes a byte to the unmanaged memory, reads the byte back from unmanaged memory, and then disposes the unmanaged memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先， 方法为零，然后释放使用 方法分配的非托管内存。The method first zeros out and then frees unmanaged memory that was allocated using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将 对象的内容封送到非托管内存块并对其进行解密。The following example uses the method to marshal and decrypt the contents of a object to a block of unmanaged memory. 然后，它使用 方法为零出并释放非托管块。It then uses the method to zero out and dispose the unmanaged block. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemAnsi#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemAnsi/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemAnsi#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemAnsi/vb/sample.vb#1)]
